alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Jackson; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 3:31PM EDT until August 12 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Jackson County in western North Carolina... Eastern Swain County in western North Carolina... West central Haywood County in western North Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 331 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Sylva, or near Smoky Mountains-Oconaluftee, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... B.R. Parkway-Smoky Mountains To Balsam Gap, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Cherokee and Smoky Mountains-Cataloochee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
